targets.expr: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="fastpath function call"}) by (datname)
targets.query: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="fastpath function call"}) by (datname)

targets.expr: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction"}) by (datname)
targets.query: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction"}) by (datname)

targets.expr: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction (aborted)"}) by (datname)
targets.query: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction (aborted)"}) by (datname)
